ComicInfo.Summary: Father Clifton completes his tale of the Crimson Nun's crusade to protect the world from the forces of evil. In his story, the Crimson Nun learns that Adolf Hitler himself is behind the mission to find Azazel's prison-tomb. In order to prevent Hitler from gaining access to the power and knowledge rumored to be offered by the imprisoned angel, she must battle not only her archenemy Mordecai Black, but elements of the German Kriegsmarine and Hitler's elite bodyguard, the Liebstandarte. When Father Clifton's tale is done, Areala learns that, once again, an agent of evil seeks the tomb of Azazel.
ComicInfo.Tags: Warrior Nun Areala,Crimson Nun,Adolf Hitler,Father Black
